TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBindingHandlerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DataBindingHandlerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DataBindingHandlerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定一个设计时类，用于执行设计器内的控件数据绑定。

span.span: Specifies a design-time class that performs data binding of controls within a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义了名为数据绑定处理程序`MyDataBindingHandler`、 要使用的设计器中编辑模式。The following code example defines a data-binding handler, named `MyDataBindingHandler`, to be used by the designer in editing mode. 在退出编辑模式下，`Text`显示属性值。On exiting the editing mode, the `Text` property value is displayed.
